mention.text: New technology to improve the accuracy of eruption forecasts
the 1989 eruption from Redoubt Volcano in Alaska cost Dollars 80m
Redoubt Volcano in Alaska cost Dollars 80m
The continuous eruption of Hawaii 's Kilauea since 1983
Mount St Helens in Washington state
a volcanologist at the Smithsonian Institution
The identification of fresh volcanic glass in the erupted ash - which seemed to indicate that the volcano was about to erupt violently -
a geologist with the US Geological Survey
scientist in charge of the Hawaii Volcano Observatory at Kilauea
best viewing times , which they pass on to the tourists
